page.title: 06HORSE RIDING
page.content: In our area horse-riding is very popular.Meany people own their own horses or ponies.These are kept either in a rented field or on their own land.There are a number of riding schools in the district that give lessons,hire out horses or give instructed rides.Some people breed horses.There are many bridle paths and open spaces for riding.Shows and hunter trials are very popular and the annual show in Aylsham attracts people for Show-jumping classes,dressage and gymkhana events.If you own a horse you have to have certain basic pieces of tack and grooming equipment such as hoof stick,body brush,curry-comb, dandy-brush,sweet scraper and wisp.There is also the equipment for everyboady riding like hat,jodphurs, boots and crops.There are specialist shops selling these things.
